A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: When I saw it opening night I left feeling good\, I was happy that it wasn't another rehash of original material like I felt TFA was. Then I saw it again. The lack of continuity with TFA is jarring once you notice it\, and without any spoilers I will just say that the characters are essentially still undeveloped. I find myself not even excited to see how it ends.
